channel.title: Changing your Home
channel.description: i want to change my home from edgy to keldagrim upstairs can someone help. i'm not sure what i can do to do this.

item.title: Changing your Home
item.dc:creator: @mr_pker01 mr pker01
item.description:
@mr_pker01 wrote:

Source > Src > Server > Config.java
Search this:

public static final int START_LOCATION_X = 3409; // Replace this number to ur new X coord for the new home public static final int START_LOCATION_Y = 2932; // Replace this number to ur new Y coord for the new home public static final int RESPAWN_X = 3427; // when dead respawn here public static final int RESPAWN_Y = 2919; public static final int DUELING_RESPAWN_X = 3362; // when dead in duel area spawn here public static final int DUELING_RESPAWN_Y = 3263; public static final int RANDOM_DUELING_RESPAWN = 5; // random coords

Read full topic
